                //$(":root td").attr("style", "width:50% !important;display:in-line !important;padding:10px!important;word-break: break-all !important;");
                //$(":root td strong").attr("style", "width:50% !important;display:in-line !important;");
                $(":root table").attr("style", "width:100% !important; table-layout: fixed !important;");
            }
            
        });
        $(window).scroll(function () {
         if($(window).width()<768){  
            if ($(this).scrollTop()>150) {
                $('.back-to-top').fadeIn();
            } else {
                $('.back-to-top').fadeOut();
            }
	    }

        });

        $(".back-to-top").click(function () {
            $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 1000);
        });
 </script>
